title: Abolition of Slavery in the U.S.
description: The 13th Amendment is ratified, abolishing slavery in the United States.

title: Women Gain the Right to Vote in the U.S.
description: The 19th Amendment is ratified, granting women the right to vote.

title: Brown v. Board of Education
description: The Supreme Court rules segregation in public schools unconstitutional.

title: Montgomery Bus Boycott
description: Rosa Parks sparks a year-long boycott, leading to desegregation of buses in Montgomery.

title: March on Washington
description: Martin Luther King Jr. delivers his famous 'I Have a Dream' speech.

title: Civil Rights Act Passed
description: Landmark legislation prohibits discrimination based on race, color, religion, sex, or national origin.
